title: Lae'zel
tags: where to find laezel in bg3
how to romance laezel in bg3
content: ornugoss for the first time, allow Lae'zel to speak on your behalf. When asked by Varsh Ko'kuu what you would do when you take the egg, say that you would raise it as your own flesh and blood or take it to another Nursery. Convince Varsh Ko'kuu to give you the egg and tell him you'll find another Crèche that is more forgiving. Tell Sa'Varsh Keth you'll fight the boy and proceed to kill him. Let Lae'zel go first into the zaith'isk. When interacting with the zai'thisk, insist on going before Lae'z
